notes.text:
This update for python-configobj fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-26112: Fixed regular expression denial of service vulnerability in validate.py (bsc#1210070).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: All versions of the package configobj are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the validate function, using (.+?)\((.*)\).**Note:** This is only exploitable in the case of a developer, putting the offending value in a server side configuration file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
